description: Petofy offers pet health insurance plans to help cover unexpected veterinary costs and ensure your pet receives the best care.

faqs.question: What does pet health insurance cover?
faqs.answer: Coverage varies by plan, but typically includes accidents, illnesses, surgeries, and preventive care.

faqs.question: How do I file a claim?
faqs.answer: You can file a claim through the Petofy platform by submitting the necessary documents and details about the treatment.

faqs.question: What are the different insurance plans available?
faqs.answer: We offer various plans ranging from basic coverage to comprehensive plans that cover all aspects of pet health care.

additional_info.title: Flexible Payment Options
additional_info.details: Choose from a range of payment plans that fit your budget and coverage needs.

additional_info.title: 24/7 Support
additional_info.details: Our insurance plans come with 24/7 support to assist you with claims and coverage queries.
